name: Bali from the nature side !!!!
description: Mostly the tourist showed the famous part of Bali with their modern touch.I am trying to show you the real side of Bali with the beautiful and untouchable side of their culture and nature.Walk trough rice fields ( after while we will have a sit and relax and do some exploration about the Balinese farmer philosophy concept), get wet your feet by fresh river water,explore and you will amazed about the heritage you will see.
